selected_quotes: Científicos japoneses documentan el segundo caso conocido de 'síndrome de Down' en chimpancés.
Blind chimp with heart defect confirmed to have same chromosomal conditions as Down Syndrome #Primates
Free read now: Attempts to improve QOL of chimpanzee Kanako, through social interaction. Read more
Chimp without eyesight and heart defect confirmed to have same chromosomal conditions as Down syndrome #Primates
More about Kanako and other chimpanzees at the Kumamoto Sanctuary, Kyoto University

citation.abstract: We report a case of chimpanzee trisomy 22 in a captive-born female. Because chromosome 22 in great apes is homologous to human chromosome 21, the present case is analogous to human trisomy 21, also called Down syndrome. The chimpanzee in the present case experienced retarded growth; infantile cataract and vision problems, including nystagmus, strabismus, and keratoconus; congenital atrial septal defect; and hypodontia. All of these symptoms are common in human Down syndrome. This case was the second reported case of trisomy 22 in the chimpanzee. The chimpanzee in our case became blind by 7 years old, making social life with other chimpanzees difficult, but opportunities to interact with other conspecific individuals have been offered routinely. We believe that providing her with the best care over the course of her life will be essential.
citation.title: Chimpanzee Down syndrome: a case study of trisomy 22 in a captive chimpanzee

news.title: Voor de tweede keer een chimpansee met ‘syndroom van Down’ ontdekt
news.summary: De chimpansee heeft een chromosomale afwijking die heel sterk vergelijkbaar is met het syndroom van Down bij mensen.

news.title: Researchers Document Second Case of 'Down Syndrome' in Chimps
news.summary: Japanese researchers have confirmed the second case known to science of a chimpanzee born with trisomy 22, a chromosomal defect similar to that of Down syndrome (or trisomy 21) in humans.

news.title: Kanako, femelle chimpanzé atteinte de trisomie
news.summary: 22. Le syndrome de Down ou trisomie 21, est une anomalie chromosomique largement connue chez les humains.

news.title: 'Down Syndrome' in Chimps Seen for Only the Second Time
news.summary: Credit: Kumamoto Sanctuary, Kyoto University Researchers from Japan's Kyoto University have documented just the second case in chimpanzees of a genetic disorder similar to Down syndrome in humans.

news.title: Chimp With Down Syndrome Is Only 2nd Ever Documented
news.summary: (Newser) – Researchers in Japan have discovered only the second known chimpanzee born with what is, essentially, Down syndrome, according to a study published Tuesday in Primates.

news.title: Kanako è cieca e vive sola: è il secondo scimpanzé al mondo con la Sindrome di Down
news.summary: Si conosce soltanto un altro caso di scimpanzé colpito dal difetto cromosomico, registrato nel lontano 1969.

news.title: Second case of 'Down syndrome' in chimpanzees identified in Japan
news.summary: Feb. 21 (UPI) -- Scientists at Kyoto University in Japan have identified another chimpanzee with trisomy 22, a Down syndrome-like chromosomal disorder.

news.title: Second case of ‘Down syndrome’ in chimpanzees identified in Japan
news.summary: SIGN UP FOR OUR NEWSLETTER Feb. 21 (UPI) — Scientists at Kyoto University in Japan have identified another chimpanzee with trisomy 22, a Down syndrome-like chromosomal disorder.

news.title: Meet Kanako, the chimp with 'down syndrome' who could help find a cure
news.summary: The second ever recorded case of a chimpanzee with trisomy 22 - a chromosomal defect similar to Down syndrome (trisomy 21) in humans - has been confirmed by Japanese researchers.

news.title: Researchers document second case of 'Down syndrome' in chimps
news.summary: Japanese researchers have confirmed the second case known to science of a chimpanzee born with trisomy 22, a chromosomal defect similar to that of Down syndrome (or trisomy 21) in humans.

news.title: Chimpanzee With Down Syndrome, And Animals That Don’t Have It
news.summary: On February 21, Springer Link published an article about a chimpanzee with Down syndrome, one of the few animals ever recorded to have the genetic disorder.

news.title: Researchers document second case of 'Down syndrome' in chimps
news.summary: Japanese researchers have confirmed the second case known to science of a chimpanzee born with trisomy 22, a chromosomal defect similar to that of Down syndrome (or trisomy 21) in humans.

news.title: For only the second known time, a chimp has a disorder similar to Down Syndrome
news.summary: A 24-year-old chimp in Japan has a genetic disorder similar to Down Syndrome in humans, researchers have found.

news.title: Trisomy Spotted in Chimp
news.summary: Researchers have uncovered a chimpanzee in Japan that has a Down syndrome-like disorder, Mashable reports.

facebook.title: チンパンジーのダウン症 －チンパンジー22番染色体異常の報告－ — 京都大学
facebook.summary:
チンパンジーのダウン症 －チンパンジー22番染色体異常の報告－ 
http://www.kyoto-u.ac.jp/ja/research/research_results/2016/170221_2.html

　平田聡 野生動物研究センター教授らの研究グループは、チンパンジーで染色体異常の症例を確認しました。チンパンジー22番染色体の異常（トリソミー：通常2本である染色体が3本ある異常）を持つ個体で、大型類人猿の22番染色体はヒトの21番染色体に相当するため、ヒト21番染色体トリソミーに相当する症例です
